item.description:
SEARLES CASTLE ... IS ONLY OPEN ONCE A YEAR !

COME AND EXPERIENCE THIS HISTORICAL TREASURE.

Â 

The architecture of this historical castle is outstanding and the furnishings are simply amazing. There will be guides in every room to explain the origins of the everything you see ... from the moldings around the doors to the antiques that furnish the many rooms of the castle.

The admissions of $10 for adults and $8 for seniors will be paid at the door. Your admission gives you the opportunity to win a pure white handmade throw. Tickets will also be sold to win faboulous theme baskets valued from $100 to $500.

After we tour the castle and the beautiful grounds, you are invited back to my place for a wine tasting pot luck dunner. I will provide a garden salad and a yummy pasta casserole. Please bring a bottle of wine/beer/soda and either an appetizer or dessert to share.

This event is posted on other meetup sites so please only RSVP on one site. No need to RSVP if you are not attending. As always, participation in all meetup events is at your own risk and your attendance means that you accept this policy.

Contact number for Barb/Peanut is 603-540-7467
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet by the ticket booth. I will wear a meetup pin.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: TOUR SEARLES CASTLE
